name: creecher.exe
description:
Technically a game! Well, more of a platformer physics engine with a settings menu stapled to it. But it's a really nice settings menu!

Move with WASD, jump with Space.

All graphics and audio were made during the jam, with the exception of the fonts.

The environment can be modified on lower difficulty settings.

(This was my first time making a game that isn't turn-based since about ten years ago.)

Update 2022/12/3: Fixed some bugs. Added gender options and music pitch
